params._token: ERC20 token used for staking and rewards

params._rewardRate: Initial reward rate in tokens per second
params.initialOwner: Address that will own the contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.to: Address to receive the rescued tokens

params._rate: New reward rate in tokens per second

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateRewardsOnly().details: This function only triggers the updateReward modifier

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

balanceOf(address).notice: Mapping of user address to staked balance

earned(address).notice: Calculates the total rewards earned by an account

exit().notice: Withdraws all staked tokens and claims all rewards

i_stakingToken().notice: ERC20 token used for both staking and rewards

rescue(address,address,uint256).notice: Owner can rescue unrelated tokens (not the staking token)

rewardPerToken().notice: Calculates the current reward per token

rewardRate().notice: Reward rate in tokens per second

rewards(address).notice: Mapping of user address to their pending rewards

setRewardRate(uint256).notice: Updates the reward rate (tokens per second)

updateRewardsOnly().notice: Manually triggers reward update for the caller

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address).notice: Mapping of user address to their reward per token paid

version().notice: Returns the version of this contract

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws staked tokens from the vault

documentation.text: @notice Error thrown when amount is zero
@notice Error thrown when withdrawal amount exceeds staked balance
@notice Error thrown when attempting to rescue the staking token
